item.title: Homes are increasingly at risk from floods. Elevation can help
item.description: Climate change is raising the risk of dangerous flooding, especially in coastal communities. For some towns on the Jersey Shore, the most practical solution is raising homes off the ground.

item.description: For generations, people have looked for small, informal signs that a recession is coming or already here. This phenomenon recently exploded on social media, often in joke form.

item.title: Why knowing your neighbors can be an important climate solution
item.description: Earthaven Ecovillage fared remarkably well after Hurricane Helene. The community had backup power and water systems, as well as food supplies, but members also knew how to work together in a crisis.

item.title: By removing invasive bullfrogs, scientists help Yosemite's native turtles recover
item.description: The huge amphibians "will literally just feed on anything that fits into their mouth" — including turtle hatchlings. Clearing thousands of frogs from ponds helped other species stage a comeback.

item.title: K-pop group BTS set to reunite as two more members complete military service
item.description: BTS has been on a break since June 2022 to focus on solo projects and serve in the South Korean military. All of the group's members are scheduled to finish mandatory enlistment by the end of June.
